website_summaries.verdict: Small, unobtrusive unit with clear HD video. Custom recording options mean you get a lot of oomph for the price.
pros: Clear HD video at a great price, with a very good auto sensor
Small size makes it a discrete pick
cons: User manual is a bit confusing and vague about setup
Some consumers report issues with the cam in extremely high heat

customer_reviews.title: How much to you have to spend on a reliable dash cam?
customer_reviews.text: I have this cam for almost 1 full year. I periodically take the cam into my home to review the footage. Some trips it records other trips it does not. FFS how much do you have to spend to get a "REAL, WORKING" dash cam. One that works ALL the time not intermittently. I bought this one because of the price (just under $100). Had purchased others under or around $50 but returned them because they were crap. I own quite a few electronic devices that never fail. How come no one can produce a dash cam that DOESN'T FAIL or do I have to spend $400?
customer_reviews.author: How Ward

customer_reviews.title: Best dash cam I've had!
customer_reviews.text: I used the camera for my company car .. I'm on the road for over 10 hours .. I have it plugged in constantly and have the settings for the high quality and record times one minute .. and it is the best camera I've had!! For this low costing price I couldn't ask for more! The battery doesn't last no more then 30 minutes but it you keep it plugged in all the time it will keep recording and you don't have to worry about the battery life .. I do wish the SIM card space was a lot more but it makes due .. I would recommend this camera to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera once I got it figured out. Being a typical male, I didn't view the video or follow instructions and plugged the camera directly into my car's USB port and the camera did not record. Once I tried the cigarette plug provided with the unit, it worked fine. I did find it very difficult to read the extra small print in the manual, so watch the video provided and you should have no problems.
customer_reviews.author: RE

customer_reviews.title: Not good. Constant freezing issues.
customer_reviews.text: This dashcam sucks. It worked well for about 2 weeks then it started having issues freezing. Every 2 or 3 minutes it pauses recording and just sits for 10 to 50 seconds with a weird loading symbol before resuming. If I leave it plugged in for more than 30 minutes it starts this obnoxious beeping sound that doesn't stop until I unplug it and wait for the battery to die.... On the bright side the suction cup works well.
customer_reviews.author: micah

customer_reviews.title: High quality, trouble-free camera
customer_reviews.text: I've had an earlier model in one of our cars for 4 years and bought this one for our new car. Easy to use and trouble-free once you set it up. Terrific picture quality. I use a 64GB SDHC micro card, which gives about 7 hours at hi-res, recording in 3-5 min. segments which loop continually. EVERYONE should have a dash cam. If anyone ever runs a light and hits you, or backs into you, this will end the "he-said, she-said" argument.
customer_reviews.author: James A.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice compact Dash Cam.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for a week so far on the daily basis. And I've reviewed the recording quality. Surprisingly, both Video and Audio are very impressive. I just set up the time/date initially and left everything else as default. And the menu is also very user friendly. This is my second one from Ausdom in two years. Although the long-term quality is still yet to be seen, I am satisfied with this gadget for what it can perform.
customer_reviews.author: AllenT

customer_reviews.title: Actually a nice camera!
customer_reviews.text: I was very worried about purchasing this because all the dashcams on Amazon seem to have horrific reviews. I've had this one for over 4 months now and it's worked perfectly. The picture quality is REALLY nice. Memory works just fine and it records for 10 seconds when it believes an "event" has happened (aka someone hitting your car while parked). Usually, the events it records for me is just a person walking close to my car.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca T.

customer_reviews.title: Have some issues,  good quality video
customer_reviews.text: I bought 18 of those dash cams for my company trucks/drivers. They have good color quality, even at night At the same time I’ve seen 3 issues 1. They get warm and unstick from windshield. 2. Screws from camera to bracket untighten and it falls down(u loose the screws) I lost about 5 of them already. U have to tight them from time to time. 3 and I guess biggest issue, sometimes they show recording, but they don’t. Our truck got in accident and guess what.. no video
customer_reviews.author: Vitaliy Levchuk

customer_reviews.title: After 3 month of use it stopped working keeps on ...
customer_reviews.text: After 3 month of use it stopped working keeps on shutting off ! When I complained they said I have to pay shipping back something that's a faulty item !
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W

customer_reviews.title: good quality and easy to install on my highlander
customer_reviews.text: I have to replace my old dashboard camera because of its bad video quality, I feel very lucky to choose this product, its video quality can satisfy my needs. I feel more safe with it while driving my car. I make recommendation to try it.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Did not turn on
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to be OK but would not turn on and record. I got the blue light to indicate it was recording, however, when I needed it to prove something it had no video. It is supposed to start recording when the engine starts. In the motor home it would not start recording. Engine is in rear of MH. When mounted it cannot be reached while driving. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: H E Webb

customer_reviews.title: Summer heat crashed unit
customer_reviews.text: Unit worked fine until the summer began. Heat in the car caused the unit to fail. I have sent multiple emails to technical service but no response back. It should be expected that the vehicle will get hot. Also the icons on the screen are not defined in the instruction manual so you are guessing what is on or not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Dash Cam is well worth the price, but ...
customer_reviews.text: The Dash Cam is well worth the price, but Several Features aren't worth using: The Park Mode Stores Video's every time you close your Car Door or Trunk. The FCWS/LDWS detect will Beep constantly if used. If you don't power it off properly you lose the Time & Date.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Brady

customer_reviews.title: dashcam
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but it will fall out every month, believed the suction is not enough to hold the weight,
customer_reviews.author: hsin yu wang

customer_reviews.title: Camera works well
customer_reviews.text: I have dash cams in all five of my cars and this one works as well as any of the others. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Karr Knutt

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The Ausdom AD282 DashCam is an outstanding value for the money. It is easy to set up and use. The picture is crisp and clear. You simply pop in the memory card, attach the camera to the included windshield mount, stick it to the windshield, plug it in, and go. This camera has my highest recommendation. Customer support is also outstanding. Peter Forte
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Milander-Forte

customer_reviews.title: great camera problem with suction cup - does not hold ...
customer_reviews.text: great camera problem with suction cup - does not hold to windscreen in hot weather
customer_reviews.author: Time Traveller

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Good quality video at night
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Cheap and Good quality video at night! (Set 2560*1080 30P 21:9 or 2304*1296 30P 16:9 to have a superb NIGHT video) Cons: 1. It does not support 64GB. Wheel of death appears after my 64GB is full. Now works fine after switching to 32GB. 2. No Wi-Fi connectivity. 3. NIGHT Video on other resolutions is very bad (1920*1080 45P 16:9, 1920*1080 30P 16:9, HDR 1920*1080P 30P 16:9, 1280*720 60P 16:9, 1280*720 30P 16:9) Conclusion: Very cheap and recommended. I will give 5 stars if my CONS will be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still need the cord I still don’t have a cord that needs to connect to my computer
customer_reviews.text: I tried over and over to get Support and trying to get the cord that did not come with the product when it arrived. I had to buy the Sim card that was supposed to come and it did not. Every time I called they tell me they don’t know what it is that I need very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Agnes Hinsch

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera, works great for the price. Though ours didn't come with the SD card like it's supposed to, hoping Ausdom will fix that.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Defective suction-cup mount
customer_reviews.text: Despite cleaning the windshield carefully, the suction-cup mount kept coming loose and the camera kept falling onto the dashboard causing the power jack to break rendering the camera useless after less than a day.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon L Gensler

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Nice video. I don't like that it turns on whenever you touch/move it to put it on or take it off the holder. I guess that's a good thing though for actually recording the important stuff. Display is small so watching live or playback on the screen isn't great. Price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbow

customer_reviews.title: Good for day use, Acceptable for night.
customer_reviews.text: Camera is compact, controls are not bad, but does not have good enough dynamic range for night filming.
customer_reviews.author: Ivo

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my brother he likes it very much
customer_reviews.author: Janet F Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I did not use this for many days for the quality of the audio and video are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Raghu

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit. If you drive in the city you should have one of these. Nice size
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! High Quality Video and has saved my Daughter! Must have for anyone who travels or drives alot. Wish I could get a replacement screw and nut for the bolt that holds the camera to the Suction Cup.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, cleaver
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, cleaver, just right, perfect. I can't say enough about how much I like this device. Really really useful! Try it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad luck with this one(((
customer_reviews.text: Ok camera. The video quality was grate while camera was working. The reason I gave 1 stars, is camera worked only for 5 month. Camera would not record at all, or records only for 18 sec and then I have to restart the camera. It freezes all the time. Not reliable at all.So i would by something else.
customer_reviews.author: Max.

customer_reviews.title: Good for portable use
customer_reviews.text: This unit works well for portable use plugged into a cigarette lighter. the cigarette lighter cord cannot be adapted for permanent install. The other cable in the box appears to be a computer interface cable. The customer service is really bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this unit
customer_reviews.text: I love this unit. Great video image high definition video. Had a few problems, but return policy is 30 days. Once I got a solid unit now I love it. What do you expect from a $100 unit, I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Paul DeMoret

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great!.Very reliable and the video and audio is awesome.Would recommend these product to everyone.I'm a truck driver so I needed a good security companion and this product does the job for me.Now I'm more confident on the road.Serves as my third eye.Get it and you will love it.Very easy to operate too.!
customer_reviews.author: Jose C.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: No memory card despite the fact that it clearly stated it came with a 16GB memory card.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Hoggarth

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for your buck. Easy to install and easy to use. Picture quality is good as is sound recording quality. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Bassil Alanbari

customer_reviews.title: It had a good video picture coverage and everything else but It kept ...
customer_reviews.text: So sorry we had to return dash cam. It had a good video picture coverage and everything else but It kept getting hot and I was afraid it might blow up. I mean hot!
customer_reviews.author: countrybumpin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera easy to use and has a great pictuure.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bottles

customer_reviews.title: Nice device
customer_reviews.text: Without the need to delete unimportant videos manually. That’s too convenient for me. Also, its suitable size never hinder my sight while driving car.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Dufour

customer_reviews.title: I didn't have super high expectations for this because of the price
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have super high expectations for this because of the price. It is in fact very good quality, both sound and video. The battery is not very good, but I leave mine plugged in so no big deal. The suction cup for the windshield works pretty darn good. I would in fact buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando O.

customer_reviews.title: FIVE Star
customer_reviews.text: This item though is much better, as they say, you pay for what you get. I have had no trouble with it so far.Good quality cam!
customer_reviews.author: YMZ

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Liked everything about it except suction cup need to be a little stronger
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN S.

customer_reviews.title: Missing memory card
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine today but did not come with a memory card ?
customer_reviews.author: barry dunlop

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. Navigating within the camera is awkward when driving in the car (for the passenger). Picture is great both on the camera and in playback.
customer_reviews.author: K. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Good product with reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and the videos recorded by the camera are with high definition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The camera works properly. I use it around a mount and have no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Great video quality
customer_reviews.text: The cam does not turn off all the time. it automatically saves a file instead of overwriting it. I am getting more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Glover

customer_reviews.title: Short Trips Self Powered Limitation
customer_reviews.text: Good to Great would be achieved if Dash Cam was self powered for short trips, requiring external power for trips longer than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Dell Daugherity

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying my new dashcam! Small problem with the shipping but 1 email and the company fixed it that day! Wired it to my dashboard in less than 20min with the extension cord provided. Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kind of hard to figure out how to use the functions.
customer_reviews.author: GSBJR

customer_reviews.title: Dash cam
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for contacting about the product I bought...reluctantly saying this dashboard cam it's not functioning as told..often screen frozen and you need to restart
customer_reviews.author: lent yenal

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for a friend.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a friend of my fiance and she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Skaggs

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great Audio and Visual quality, the only drawback I can say is that it occasionally gets stuck buffering for a few minutes, but it can be fixed by pressing the reset button.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most of the functions was great. One thing I didnt give 5 star because ...
customer_reviews.text: Most of the functions was great. One thing I didnt give 5 star because sometime I have to reset it to go back to recovery mode.
customer_reviews.author: michael rosario

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise a great unit.
customer_reviews.text: Would have gotten 5 stars if it had gps. Otherwise a great unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Very easy to set up. Greet quality. Mounting bracket is great. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Beetlejewice

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, amazon came through as usual
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, amazon came through as usual. Product works great. Make sure you clean windshield good so suction cup will hold.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Clark

customer_reviews.title: I put this in my car before leaving for vacation ...
customer_reviews.text: I put this in my car before leaving for vacation. I had to play with it to get it to stop beeping etc as if doesn't seem to be doing what the instructions say it is supposed to do. It also doesn't appear to save anything that is happening when it's little spinning thing is on the screen. It also hands and doesn't record. I was planninf to off load videos of the vacation but found it didn't record that much, and had big gaps in the videos.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works nicely.....wish the directions were more detailed regarding settings and operation....
customer_reviews.author: Brian Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and has good picture
customer_reviews.text: it works as promised. easy to use and has good picture.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: No good item. after 4 months the camera is dead. ☹️

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: still trying to figure out when it's recording and when it's not, keeps shutting off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding buy.
customer_reviews.text: I was astounded how clear and beautiful the videos are from this device. I do wish it told you a Micro-SD card was needed, not a standard SD card. From the looks of it a lot of other people ordered a standard SD card which of course doesn't work. Videos are in MOV format. You need to get a MOV player to view them. They're free on the web.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Owner manual is too vague about how it works and the set up procedure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Night vision, accelerometer sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting more from the night vision. I had a $30 unit with better picture in the dark. Even at the lowest setting the crash detector is too sensitive. Any speed bump can set it off.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the constant noise it makes in detection mode or ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't like the constant noise it makes in detection mode or that I can't play back video. This is the first one I bought and really don't have anything to compare it to. Should of done more research.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good hardware
customer_reviews.text: suction cup is not staying place, always falling on my dashboard
customer_reviews.author: alro24

customer_reviews.title: CONSTANT BEEPING
customer_reviews.text: Although I have turned off the beep tone option, it still beeps. When I am talking on my car phone, people hear the beep in the background and think I am taping them. Not good. Other than that, it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its okay I just wish I wouldve known that you ...
customer_reviews.text: Its okay I just wish I wouldve known that you cant upload the vedios to your labtop to watch o well. :/

customer_reviews.title: Recommend giving a try
customer_reviews.text: Product bugged out but manufacturers were very helpful with testing and offering returns or refund. Recommend giving a try!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product DOES NOT have night vision. Completely FALSE advertising. Returned it.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed to find out there is no instant play-back on this device, I.E. Vehicle accident/red light running ect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it works and operates great.
customer_reviews.text: It will not stick to the glass and keeps falling. Otherwise, it works and operates great.
customer_reviews.author: Lupe Valdez

customer_reviews.title: after getting a new card it works great.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit in April of 2016 and went thur hell to get it to work wright come to find out it was the memory card that I had purchased at Walmart,after getting a new card it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great dash cam, records good, small, easy to set up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Night Vision at All
customer_reviews.text: Description says night vision but at night video is completely black. Useless as a parking monitor because the camera won't record anything at night unless you park in a well lit area. 06-24-2016 Updating to 4 stars. All cameras seem to have this problem. Comparatively, this camera is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: tony95

customer_reviews.title: Boo
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive a camera I got a screen cover for an iPhone 6
customer_reviews.author: Christel f.

customer_reviews.title: you would have to buy micro chip, never stayed ...
customer_reviews.text: you would have to buy micro chip, never stayed on the window for a long time, always fall off. And one day it just rang for no reason, tried all button to close it but couldn't. While I was trying to close it, one of the screw fall off and lost. The ring stopped when it run out of power. Now immediately searching other products.
customer_reviews.author: kidasai

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic - AZ residents, pls stay away.
customer_reviews.text: Well, this is a great camera, easy to install, great video quality, easy to operate. You must be thinking why did I give one star if this camera was great, but wait, I live in Arizona and when the outside temperature reached 110F, this camera melted, literally melted inside my car. See attached picture, and during the process, it damaged my 32GB SD card :-(. So, if you are a resident of NM, AZ, NV, and southern CA, you may want to skip this one, all other state residents - I guess you will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: RV81

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This broke less than 2 months of using it. The micro SD port broke from normal use of plugging the cord in and out. Very disappointing. Do not buy. Don't waste your money, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: betterworldbiker

customer_reviews.title: The suction cup on the suction mount looked like it had some white stuff adhere to it
customer_reviews.text: While the product may work well we have yet to know that. It was advertised as new and in the original packaging. On arrival we opened the Revlon box to find what appeared to be a used item in a plastic bag. The plastic bag was sealed and included the camera, suction mount and USB cord. The items that were advertised to be included with this product (car charger, SD card and instruction manual) were not included in the box. The suction cup on the suction mount looked like it had some white stuff adhere to it. We think this is a used item and will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: It's not great, but not horrible
customer_reviews.text: The daytime camera is ok. It's not great, but not horrible. The nighttime camera is why I gave it one star. Much of my driving is at night and you can't see anything unless there are street lights everywhere... even then, you can't read anything. I'll be returning it and getting one with a decent night camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: it showed a perfect video of the at-fault driver
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry to say that I had to revise my review, shortly we after we purchased the cameras they proved to be an excellent investment, as the camera captured an at fault driver in our car accident. 6 months later both of the cameras stopped working. the seller admitted the cameras were under warranty but when I asked them to replace the cameras or refund my money they immediately stopped talking to me.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: this camera is irritating it keeps beeping and it keep ...
customer_reviews.text: this camera is irritating it keeps beeping and it keep turning off and and it dont turn on when motion happens
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit very few bugs.
customer_reviews.text: Simple setup vs my other choice earlier review but now having looping issues and not sure if 32GB card is the issue or unit itself. Only in service about a month and having issues with recording options being reset. what it has recorded to date is of great quality for the money. The menus are easy to navigate and set up a snap. Just need to sort out Card issues.

customer_reviews.text: I purchased two. Each come with a 16G SD card. One SD card became faulty after week one. One camera screen is faulty. They do however record in HD and are easy to install with good features for price.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Over all a good value, having to keep plugged in to use can be a pain

customer_reviews.title: very impressed with the camera and the quality.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a few weeks now and im very pleased with the camera . The heat has gone up to 115 and this camera has no problems in that heat. The video quality is very impressive as is the mic and view angle . The setup is very easy and once the first few steps are done its just works.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Good quility easy to use / install
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in the middle of 5,000 mile trip. It is easy to set up and use, play back quality very good. It comes with SD card and you can replace with card up to 64 gig. Very good quality and doesn't constantly fall down ( you need to clean windshield prior to installing).

customer_reviews.title: I dislike that my child put it on the counter

customer_reviews.title: been using it for a year or so, and ...
customer_reviews.text: been using it for a year or so, and its so inexpensive and the videos are so hi quality I can't believe it..put one in every car..it holds a ton of video

customer_reviews.text: This is all the dashcam most will need. Its very easy to learn and the video quality is excellent! 5 stars

customer_reviews.text: This camera is very decent. Works quite well and takes excellent videos. Very impressed with this unit, and the price.

customer_reviews.text: Very good, clear footage day or night and great audio. Works perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: This is my first dash cam and am very happy with the simple instructions and that it is very ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first dash cam and am very happy with the simple instructions and that it is very user friendly. Great product!

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty cool little piece of technology
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty cool little piece of technology. It alerts if you are close to cars or close to driving off the road.
customer_reviews.author: janetplanet

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is working really well. I will give another update when I have had it a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: Convenience item, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well – constructed piece of kit, with an excellent design, clearly with a view to being as compact as possible. This is definitely one of the better ones out there.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas lin

product_meta.title: Ausdom Dash Cam, Dashboard Camera Recorder with Full HD 1296P, 2.4" LCD, Wide Angle,Night Vision , G-Sensor, WDR, Loop Recording
feature_bullets: 【1296P Dash Cam & Ambarella A7 Processor】DashCam adopt the strongest U.S. Ambarella A7 chip solution in the industry so far,which owns the strongest processing performance,faster operation speed,and image with higher definition among all tachograph chips.

【Night Vision & HDR High Dynamic Technology】The use of HDR high dynamic technology makes the shooting at night easier. Dash Camera features an all-glass high-resolution lens, industry leading F1.8 aperture and 7- G lens to guarantee excellent night vision.

【Emergency Lock】Triggered by G-sensor, the dashboard camera will automatically lock videos of unexpected incidents (such as a car collision or a sudden turn) can automatically record and store images.
【 Loop Recording & Parking Monitoring】 24 Hours Loop Recording.Under Parking mode with power off, dashboard camcorder turning on and recording when detecting a vibration, to keep your car's safety.
【What You Get】 Maximum support for 64G memory card. Ausdom offers 12-month warranty and 24hr * 365 days customer service response time for any quality problems.
